name: Marian Moesinger
text: Very friendly place. Wonderful animals here.

name: Mr Mane
text: A beautiful building right in the middle of downtown the couple of photos are the view from the 25th floor. The 25th floor is corporate security offices and training I was there for training so I will give it three stars just because of the beauty of the building and some of the very large expensive tables that they have in this building.

name: Harrison C. Davies
text: This is a really cool coastal landmark and has some very rich history not to mention some unique records. Interior and exterior have a modern yet classy feel and it’s a great icon for Mobile and the state of Alabama as a whole! #mobile #alabama #battlehousetower #skyscrapper #interstate10 #gulfcoast

name: Deedee Webb
text: This was a great experience!!! Vinita and Erica, were wonderful, so helpful...They took wonderful care of our group.  We were at Regis for about 2 months the offices and restrooms were always very clean. Their security procedures made you feel that your work area was very safe.  I would recommend Regis to anyone that needs space for their business

name: Doctor Pepper
text: Awesome view and a great customer service

name: Roberto Singleton
text: Great customer service, and the view is amazing! They are located in the tallest building in Alabama.

name: Amber Adams
text: Wonderful

name: ALLAN BARNETT
text: Nice facility inside and out

name: Jim Weaver
text:
Service is terrible, receptionist may or may not be around to let you in your room.  Billing is a mess and trying to cancel is nearly impossible.  I have asked local manager to cancel two weeks ago, then I got billed for January this week, when I called she said "oh yeah you need to do that on the website."

In response to your reply............we contacted customer service 5 days ago and NO RESPONSE!  How about a number of email address of a human that can actually do something about this?

resp.text: I'm sorry if there've been any charges made in error. For any fees that are not stated in your contract, we'd be happy to help resolve these. Please send us your company reference number and we'll ask Customer Service to contact you. Thank you.

name: Eric andrews
text:
The worst service I have ever received from any business.They Lied to us and cost us thousands of dollars. We ended up homeless. The york county south Carolina office is absolutely terrible.  We tried to buy a house using a V.A. loan we were lied to about pre approval for over a month. We broke the lease on our apartment and packed up all our belongings. The day of closing they called us and said they couldn't approve us till September. My wife is a disabled veteran and now 4 months pregnant. Because of the incompetence and blatant dishonesty of mortgage right we were homeless for the 4rth of July. We recently found out from our new loan company that (M.R) never even started the V.A. application process. They knew from day 1 that they wouldn't approve us but still lied to us for a whole month taking our appraisal, and Ernest money. The treatment we received was out right despicable the agents at their South Carolina office. Made us loose a substantial amount of money 1000.00 for the U-haul alone. They will be hearing from our attorney about that.
We will be reporting them to the B.B.B and we are currently in the process of getting this company black listed from the V.A. So no other service members are subjected to these kind of scumbagg business practices..
We are also contacting every news outlet in the following counties. York,lancaster,Chesterfield and Mecklenburg.
Loan company takes advantage of 22 yo pregnant veteran resulting in homelessness on the 4rth of July...what a headline..

resp.text: Thank you for your review, Eric. Although it sounds like this may not be about Regus office spaces? If this based on one of the companies that uses Regus, please speak to them directly.

name: December Sixx
text: Very nice place.  I had to visit my insurance agent there.

name: Tiffany Perz
text: Nice people

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review!

name: wendy roberts
text: Ask for Shelley. She is a fantastic manager.

name: Aaron Gregory
text: Great meeting location, helpful staff

name: Jonathan Barbee
text: Great services and nice staff.

name: Brandy Olander
text: Great office space.  Kristine is wonderful!

name: Rashid Swanson
text: My girlfriend has her office for her non emergency medical transport company here called Angena healthcare services,  and I work here with a billboard company called smart safe systems, and they have miscommunications between corporate and the local branches sometimes, but other than that everything is perfect.

name: Kristine Jones
text: I love having my office with Regus! It is clean, professional, and friendly. My clients love the building and interacting with the staff. I am proud to tell people in the community I am in a Regus space in one of the most beautiful buildings in downtown Montgomery. As a new business owner, I am happy I made the choice of starting my business in a Regus office!

name: Frank Truncali
text: My experience so far with Regus has been great.  The staff is great and I love the building.  It's a good value for office space in downtown Montgomery.

name: Cheryl Phillips
text: The staff is simply amazing and helpful! Definitely a great place to have your office located in. The decor is very nice, clean, and modern. You will feel like a 5star business and your customers will too.

name: Jeffrey Prescott
text: So I went to look at a new office space for my work and I was nervous and new and amiee and Mallory were awesome in helping me pick the right plan for me I got a space and I love it  keep up the great work guys

name: JAMM Resources LLC
text: Regus is wonderful! Nice office space, amenities, & staff. I’m so glad I found an all in one office space!

name: Ms Always Classy.
text: This is a very secured, beautiful building. From the time you walk in, until the time that you leave, you feel a sense of security.

name: Clarissa Harris
text: Beautiful Place! !

name: Marcus Jones
text: Very friendly staff!

name: Don Johnson
text: another RSA state owned office complex.

name: Shatia Miller
text: Amazing staff.

name: Jon Vaughn
text: Very sweet girl that helped us demo the device.  Great experience.

name: BamaLen G.
text: Friendly people

name: Suanne Nutter
text: Beautiful office space

name: christa lodico
text: Nice people

name: Mark Branson
text: I have been a customer for several years. They have recently let go of everyone that used to run this location. Service has disappeared, communication has also vanished. Despite not adhering to the level of professionalism and service promised, they are refusing to let me out of a contract that was subsequently inflated without explanation. Please avoid at all costs!

resp.text: Hello Mark. I'm sorry to hear this. Please can you email customer.service@regus.com with your account number, along with details of your experience. A member of the Customer Service team will be in touch with you shortly. Thank you.

name: Gary
text: Nice, quiet place to do business. Easy to get too / convenient location.

name: dingo Rex
text: Great place

name: rebecca anderson
text: Fantastic company

name: David Thomas
text: Clean, attractive, well run location. Very accommodating.
